otherNames: The Hundred Refined To God, Become a god, 百炼成神, Bai Lian Cheng Shen, Hundred Refinements to Become a God, Supreme body Refining
synopsis: Luo Zheng was originally the young head of the Luo family, but due to the family civil strife, his father was killed, and he became a “meat target” who was beaten by others. , forged himself into a weapon, and since then, relying on “beating” to counterattack and change his life, he has grown from a small domestic slave to a peerless genius that has attracted much attention. However, just when he was most brilliant, he suddenly found that his life was like a script, and every step seemed to be carefully arranged by some mysterious force… Can he see through the mystery of his own destiny? How about writing your own path to becoming a god? “Bai Lian Cheng Shen Dynamic Comics” animation, also known as: [Apotheosis]
